Home.WhatDoText: I like to develop tools that impact and improve people’s life quality. I encourage quality results-oriented teamwork and effective problem resolution.
Home.WebAppText: Development of web applications for the community, from an idea to a complete application.
Home.WebPlatformText: Development of web platforms that provide solutions to the specific needs of the client.

AboutMe.AboutMeTitle: I can give the best thath you always wanted
AboutMe.AboutMeText: Mechatronic Engineer, Programmer and Software Developer. Tech lover, I like to develop tools that impact and improve people’s life quality. I encourage quality results-oriented teamwork and effective problem resolution. Between my competencies I emphasize my leadership, project management, SCRUM, responsibility, adaptability, communication, negotiation skills and commitment.
AboutMe.MySkillsText: Management of languages, such as Java Script, HTML, CSS, SQL, Node, React. Management of development tools such as Git, GitHub, Visual Studio. Management of design tools such as Figma and Solidworks.

ContactMe.ContactMeText: You can leave me a message through my contact information or through the form.
